Move the numbers and arithmetic signs shown below to complete the resulting equation with no spaces between them. Leading and trailing spaces are allowed. When finished, click the "Submit" button. figure(playWithNumbers)init({%prms1%});

data=[]
vA=random.choice(range(2,20))
vB=random.choice(range(1,10))
op='÷'
vA *= vB
vAns=int(vA/vB)
vStr=list(f'{vA}{op}{vB}={vAns}')

x=random.choice([item for item in enumerate(vStr) if item[1].isnumeric()])
exps=[str(f) for f in range(10)]
